skills.Name: Fist Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 when using a fist weapon.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 5.3 and Evasion by 3, and decreases the chance of receiving Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Agile Movement
skills.Description: Increases Accuracy by 2 and Speed by 5 when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Force Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs the target's Momentum. Momentum can be absorbed with a 15% chance for regular physical attacks and 30% during a critical attack. Applies when a fist weapon is equipped. Up to stage 1 of Momentum can be absorbed.

skills.Name: Burning Fist
skills.Description: Hurls a Fire type iron-fist to attack the target with 285 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a fist weapon. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical. Regains Mana.

skills.Name: Force Blaster
skills.Description: Discharges a powerful energy beam at the enemy dealing 90 Energy Damage. Requires a fist weapon.

skills.Name: Hurricane Assault
skills.Description: Attacks the target with rapid consecutive strikes dealing 500 Physical Damage. Requires a fist weapon. Increases Power upon consumption of up to 2 Momentum levels. Over-hit and Critical are possible. Ignores Shield Defense.

skills.Name: Force Burst
skills.Description: Hurls a powerful burst of energy at enemies in front dealing 460 Energy Damage. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Stunning Fist
skills.Description: With tremendous speed, you sucker punch the target dealing 30 Physical Damage and inflicting Stun for 5 seconds. Requires a fist weapon. Over-hit is possible.

skills.Name: Drain Punch
skills.Description: Drain the life energy from your target with a powerful punch dealing 60 Physical Damage and healing for %s2 of HP.

skills.Name: Raging Force
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with a devastating burst of wind and gathers Momentum while cutting their defenses. Deals 720 Energy Damage and reduces target defense by 23% for 10 seconds. Requires 2 Momentum to cast.

skills.Name: Puma Spirit Totem
skills.Description: The Pumas Soul enters your body, giving you their agile speed and savagery in exchange for your power. For 5 minutes, increase your Attack Speed by 100 and reduce your Physical Skills CD by 10%. Requires a hand-to-hand weapon.

skills.Name: Ogre Spirit Totem
skills.Description: Becomes possessed by an Ogre's soul. Increases one's own P. Atk./P. Def./M. Def. by 30% and Critical Damage by 10% for 15 seconds. Requires a fist weapon.
